FuncDef: This command displays information related to H-OFS configuration and operations as per the parameters specified.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the name of the configured H-OFS instance, up to 32 characters.
Displays information on the controller for the specified H-OFS instance. Values-ip-address:  a.b.c.d.
Displays status information for the specified H-OFS switch or its controller.
Displays information about flowtables for the specified H-OFS instance.
Displays information about the logical OpenFlow ports registered with the specified H-OFS instance.
